This page contains a compilation of Basic R Modules. The best way to learn is to use the slides while working actively on R studio on the examples provided by the slides. The slides contains guided exercises after introduction of a concept. R is a coding language. The best way to learn a coding language is by doing. So pick a module a get started right away.
